    static int
    HotelAnalysis.getTotalOccupancy(TreeMap<String,Reservation> reservationList, Date start, Date end)
    This overloaded method gets the total occupancy for all hotel over a certain period of time It uses the AnalyseHotels method to find all reservations between a certain period of time Loops through an arrayList containing all reservations for that period of time and adds the number of occupants for all hotels
    static int

  • Uses of Reservation in CsvReaderWriter

    Methods in CsvReaderWriter that return types with arguments of type Reservation
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static TreeMap<String,Reservation>
    ReadReservationFile.readReservation(String filepath)
    This method takes a csv file and reads through it using a buffered reader storing each value and eventually converting them to a reservation using the reservation class and object and storing them in a TreeMap The buffered reader reads the data column by column until it reaches the last column it then skips onto the next row and begins reading from column index 0 again until there are no more rows.
    Method parameters in CsvReaderWriter with type arguments of type Reservation
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    CsvWriter.writeCsv(String filePath, TreeMap<String,Reservation> reservations)
    This method locates a csv file and fills it with a reservation stored in a reservation object It uses the filewriter to append values into the csv file.
